description: This file defines a REST controller for handling Task CRUD operations in a Spring Boot application. It includes endpoints for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting tasks, each requiring authentication.

classes.name: TaskController
classes.description: REST controller for managing task-related CRUD operations, mapping HTTP requests to service calls.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new task for the authenticated user based on the request payload.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all tasks for the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific task by ID if it belongs to the authenticated user.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Partially updates a task identified by ID using the provided update request.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID if it belongs to the authenticated user.
